00017 FileGeneralEditor::FileGeneralEditor(QWidget *parent, File* file): 
00018 QGroupBox(tr("General options"), parent), 
00019 file_(file),
00020 logicalName_(this), 
00021 logicalDefault_(tr("Only used as default"), this),
00022 includeFile_(tr("File is include file"), this),
00023 externalDec_(tr("File contains external declarations"), this),
00024 description_(this) {
00025 
00026         Q_ASSERT_X(file_, "FileGeneralEditor constructor",
00027                 "Null File-pointer given for constructor");
00028 
00029         QLabel* logicNameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Logical name:"), this);
00030         logicNameLabel->setToolTip(tr("Logical name for the file or directory.\n"
00031                 "For example VHDL library name for a vhdl-file"));
00032 
00033         QLabel* descLabel = new QLabel(tr("Description of the file:"), this);
00034         descLabel->setToolTip(tr("Description of the file for the user"));
00035 
00036         QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00037         layout->addWidget(logicNameLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00038         layout->addWidget(&logicalName_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00039         layout->addWidget(&logicalDefault_, 0, 2, 1, 1);
00040         layout->addWidget(&includeFile_, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00041         layout->addWidget(&externalDec_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00042         layout->addWidget(descLabel, 2, 0, 1, 2);
00043         layout->addWidget(&description_, 3, 0, 2, 3);
00044 
00045         connect(&logicalName_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00046                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00047         connect(&logicalDefault_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00048                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00049         connect(&includeFile_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00050                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00051         connect(&externalDec_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00052                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00053         connect(&description_, SIGNAL(textChanged()),
00054                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00055 }

00057 FileGeneralEditor::~FileGeneralEditor() {
00058 
00059 }

00061 void FileGeneralEditor::restore() {
00062 
00063         logicalName_.setText(file_->getLogicalName());
00064         logicalDefault_.setChecked(file_->getLogicalNameDefault());
00065 
00066         includeFile_.setChecked(file_->getIncludeFile());
00067         externalDec_.setChecked(file_->getExternalDeclarations());
00068 
00069         description_.setPlainText(file_->getDescription());
00070 }
00071 
00072 void FileGeneralEditor::apply() {
00073         file_->setLogicalName(logicalName_.text());
00074         file_->setLogicalNameDefault(logicalDefault_.isChecked());
00075 
00076         file_->setIncludeFile(includeFile_.isChecked());
00077         file_->setExternalDeclarations(externalDec_.isChecked());
00078 
00079         file_->setDescription(description_.toPlainText());
00080 }
